q: many changes this season, but executive producer Nigel Lythgoe assures us that the talent this season is the best yet as he reveals some thoughts about the new season in a recent interview. Nigel Lythgoe told the Hollywood Reporter that You haven't really seen how strong the talent is yet. We can afford to lose 10 great ones this year because they're that good! Nigel Lythgoe goes on to share that this season is all about bringing the fun back into the show and he sees that happening without Simon Cowell , but with a fresh new set of judges- along with Randy of course

Influential Republican senators have proposed raising the Social Security retirement age from 67 to 69, using a formula that Congress agreed to in the 1980s to raise the retirement age from 67 to 69. We know what to do on Social Security; I put on the table[ a proposal] adjusting the age from 67 to 69, Sen. Bernie Sanders Lindsey Graham ( R-S.C.) said Wednesday.
